fr.insarouen.battleship.model

Class PlayerInGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.insarouen.battleship.model.Player
      • fr.insarouen.battleship.model.PlayerInGame

  • public class PlayerInGame
extends Player
    Describes a player that is "currently" in game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlayerInGame()
      Constructs a standard player in game with a collection of boats and a grid.

      Constructs a new player in game.
      PlayerInGame(Player player, Boats boats)
      Adds a new player, knowing both his name and ip adress.
